2025 Elections
==============

Date of Next General Election & Filing Dates
--------------------------------------------

Saturday, May 3, 2025 General Election  
Up for election: Three (3) Council Members

Filing Opens on Wednesday, January 15, 2025, at 8:00 a.m. and closes on Friday, February 14, 2025, at 5:00 p.m.

The below will become available as state law allows.

* 2025 ELECTION PACKET (2025 ELECCION PAQUETE)
* VIEW ORDINANCE O1-25 (VER ORDENANZA O1-25)
* VIEW 2025 ORDER OF ELECTION (VER 2025 ORDEN DE ELECCION)

[Elections](https://www.cityofolneytx.com/administration/page/eligibility-requirements-elected-office)

[Elections Administration](https://www.cityofolneytx.com/administration/page/elections-administration)

[Candidates for City Council (Candidatos Actuales Para El Ayuntamiento)](https://www.cityofolneytx.com/administration/page/candidates-city-council-candidatos-actuales-para-el-ayuntamiento)

[Polling Location](https://www.cityofolneytx.com/administration/page/polling-location-all-elections)
